timeLivedMessages.message: Incredible! You lived for {daysLived} day(s)! You're a legend!
Amazing! You lived for {daysLived} day(s). That's seriously impressive!
Amazing! You lived for {daysLived} day(s). That's a whole Minecraft year!
Wow! You lived for {daysLived} day(s). That is quite an accomplishment!
You lived for {daysLived} day(s). How about we try that again, shall we?
You lived for {daysLived} day(s). Let's see if we can last a bit longer next time.
You lived for {daysLived} day(s). Maybe next time will be better.

timeLivedMessagesToOthers.message: Amazing! {playerName} lived for {daysLived} day(s). That's seriously impressive!
Amazing! {playerName} lived for {daysLived} day(s). That's a whole Minecraft year!
Wow! {playerName} lived for {daysLived} day(s). That is quite an accomplishment!
{playerName} only lived for {daysLived} day(s). Let's give them some encouragement!

newRecordMessage: All right! New record! You surpassed your previous record of {previousDaysLived} day(s)!
newRecordMessageToOthers: All right! {playerName} surpassed their previous record of {previousDaysLived} day(s)!
queryPlayerMessage: {playerName} has lived for {daysLived} day(s). Previous record is {previousDaysLived} day(s).
queryWorldRecordMessage: The current record holder for longest time lived is {playerName}, surviving a total of {daysLived} day(s).
timeTravelMessage: Wait... did you travel back in time?
